# The tribble() Function

## Brief Description
The tribble() function is used to create a tibble, which is a modern take on the traditional data frame. Tibbles are a reimagined version of data frames that are easier to use, better aligned with modern principles of tidy data and often better suited for working with data in R.

## What Package Contains It
The tribble() function is part of the {tibble} package, which is part of the tidyverse.
